id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

upload[url].description: The URL to upload the project. Required if the 'upload' parameter is present.

upload.description: Hash that contains information to upload the exported project to a web server or S3-compatible platform.

upload[http_method].description: HTTP method to upload the exported project. Only PUT and POST are allowed. Default is PUT.

path.description: Name and path for new project.

name.description: The name of the project to be imported. Defaults to the path of the project if not provided.

namespace.description: The ID or path of the namespace to import the project to. Defaults to the current userâ€™s namespace.

override_params.description: Supports all fields defined in the Project API. These values take precedence over values defined in the export file.

overwrite.description: If a project with the same path exists, determines whether the import overwrites it. Defaults to false.
